name: POLITICS VS GAMES LOL
description:
As everyone knows, politics and games are totally incompatible. So play POLITICS VS GAMES LOL and fight the good fight to get politics out of our vidjagames!

Kill enemies to level up. Every time you level up, more politics will be removed from the game. By the end you’ll be in a blissfull politics-free nirvana of pure gameplay.

===========================

Shooter controls: WASD to move, mouse to aim, LMB to fire. Takes 3-5 minutes for a full playthrough. Keep playing, it gets weird…
